overview: 1979 Christmas special featuring Kate Bush. She performs Gymnopedie No 1, Symphony in Blue, Them Heavy People, Madrigal, December, Wedding List, Egypt, Ran Tan Waltz, The Man with the Child in His Eyes and Don't Push Your Foot on the Heartbreak.  Guest star Peter Gabriel sings Here Comes the Flood and duets with Kate on Another Day.
title: Kate Bush - Christmas TV Special
